note.p: Death: Turramurra, New South Wales, Australia (16 November 1925)

Career: Moved to Australia (1880); Curator, Technical Museum (1881); Consulting Botanist to the Department of Agriculture (1890); Government Botanist and Director of Gardens, Sydney (1896); expert on eucalyptus and acacia; Honorary Secretary, Australasian Association for the Advancement of Science (1909-1922); retired 1924
Memberships: FLS; FRGS; Royal Society of New South Wales (President 1896 and 1911); Linnean Society of New South Wales (1901-1903)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1926 vol 100 pp viii-xi, plate, signed by R H C and T W E-D
